document_data.name: Asta Jegg'Dralnoc
document_data.mainbody: '''Asta Jegg'Dralnoc''' was a powerful [[Chosen of Lolth]] of [[House Jegg'Dralnoc]], who wandered the [[Demonweb Pits]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: Asta styled her long white hair back in a heavy ponytail and small [[crown]], and wore a daring ensemble of a collar-and-midriff-baring [[bustenhalt]] with [[sabatons]] and a spiderleg-themed flair that framed her from behind.
document_data.Abilities: Asta could call upon a number of divine powers, including ''[[heal]]'', ''[[death ward, mass]]'', ''[[cometfall]]'', and ''[[divine punishment]]''. She could also innately ''[[see invisibility]]'' and sacrifice nearby allies to Lolth to receive a powerful boon from her goddess.
document_data.History: During the [[Darkening]] and [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]], Asta wandered the Demonweb Pits, fighting intruders in Lolth's domain.
